Convert inventory data to sf based on coords and crs present

inventory_as_sf.Rd

Use coords vars and crs to convert to sf

Usage

inventory_as_sf(inventory_data)

Arguments

inventory_data

Data from an inventory as obtained from ifn_to_tibble, fia_to_tibble or ffi_to_tibble.

Value

An sf object with the same data as inventory_data and a new column with the original crs for traceability.

Examples

# \donttest{
if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
library(forestables)

# FFI
ffi_to_tibble(
  departments = c("01"), years = c(2019),
  filter_list = list("01" = c(1404119)),
  folder = "path/to/ffi/data"
) |>
  inventory_as_sf()

# FIA
fia_to_tibble(
  years = 2019, states = c("OR"),
  filter_list = list("OR" = list("59" = c(76413))),
  folder = "path/to/fia/data"
) |>
  inventory_as_sf()

# IFN
ifn_to_tibble(
  provinces = c("24"), versions = c("ifn3"),
  filter_list = list("24" = c("24_0270_xx_A4_xx")),
  folder = "path/to/ifn/data"
) |>
  inventory_as_sf()
} # }
# }
